name: Spirit Hunter (itch) (Comatrain, Vladislav_Gusev, @Shokhina)
description:
My old friend asked for help. Her trouble was so serious that she could not even speak calmly.

A rather gloomy house, located far from civilization. She bought it recently, wanted to get away from the bustle of the city. But I didn't expect something like this...

And now I have come to the other side of the world to help her.

Controls:

WASD - Character movement

MMB - Rotate object in hands

LMB - Fire

E - Interaction

P - Pause

Walkthrough (SPOILER ALERT ! ! !) Quest with food and green spirit - light up campfire, the throw food of a certain color into spirit. Red color - apple, green color - hamburger, yellow color - banana. Quest with candles and banana spirit - find 4 cards and place it on table, then light up 4 candles in right order. Then light up camp fire. Quest with gray markers and red dino spirit - put mug, chair, candle, table and book on a specific place with grey squares. If squared lights red then object was set correctly. Then light up the campfire. Go to main room and talk to dolly. Then make a decision with telephone call.
